overview:
We specialize exclusively in the finest handmade rugs from around the world. All of our rugs are one-of-a-kind, so please visit our showroom and view thousands of handmade rugs to find the rugs of your dreams.

* Over 2000 magnificent handmade fine rugs available in stock in the Scottsdale Design Center
* Our own looms and offices in India and Pakistan enable us to offer the best rugs at the lowest prices
* Best prices in Arizona
* NO gimmicks or sales, everyday low prices that are lower than most storeâ€™s sale or liquidation prices
* Award winning exceptional service and quality
* Winners of the SBA Small Business Success Award 2004
* Finalists of the Spirit of Enterprise Award 2005
* Third generation serving and exceeding expectations since 1969
* Expert graphic designers on staff to assist you. FREE design service with all placed orders
* State of the art software to automate the entire process from designing, coloring, viewing, sizing, texturing, and graphs for production
* Give us your design ideas, a photograph of a design you like, or have us design something from scratch. (20% variation required in existing designs to comply with copyright laws)
* 600 colors with ARS color system, guaranteeing accuracy in colors
* Ability to choose the quality, material, texture and weave
* Strike off provided if requested (Included)
* Air shipment for quick delivery (Included)
* Free in-home showing
* Expert cleaning and repair
